District 3

District 3 Ben Butler
View District 3 Map

Phone: 512-930-3651
Email: ben.butler@georgetowntexas.gov
Term Being Served: 1st Term
Term Expires: May 2028




Coming soon:

- Occupation
- Education
- City Boards and Commissions
- Personal
- Interests
- Goals

 

With the approval of HB 1082 in May 2021, all elected officials' personal information is to be redacted from any public documents. View redacted campaign finance and expense reports through City Secretary Records.
